The 23.5 x 11.75 display includes a 30-inch hanging chain for easy installation in a window or... More
This LED pizza sign illuminates in red to draw attention to a restaurant's front entryway. The 23.5 x 11.75 display includes a 30-inch hanging chain for easy installation in a window or doorway. This LCD pizza sign blinks to capture the focus of guests. This food display is an LED pizza sign that is an incredible value! What makes this signage such a great deal? Simple, this LED pizza sign that is energy efficient saves money for customers on power expenses, in addition to having a low upfront price point. Restaurants can rest assured they meet any green-standards set by corporate offices when using this signage, as the energy efficiency makes these units environmentally friendly. In addition to being a great bargain, this LED pizza sign is very effective at capturing passing traffic, and patrons into a dinner, parlor or restaurant. The text is formed by a double row of red-color bulbs. This LED pizza sign that has red lights is very easy for potential customers to read, as the text pops-out from the black background and frame. An animation option comes standard on this unit as well. Pull the chain once to turn the LED pizza sign on for a non-animated illumination. Pull the chain a second time to animate the signage. Finally, pull a third time to turn the LED pizza sign off. (1) 30" long chain is included with the purchase of this food display for hanging the unit in a storefront window. This restaurant fixture, led pizza sign includes a power supply with a 69" long cord. The long power cord ensures users can hang the signage high in a window, while still plugging the unit into a standard height wall outlet. The light box features a plastic construction. As a result, these signs weight approximately 5 lbs, which makes them easy to mount. Illuminated window displays add new life to any storefront advertising campaign. If your parlor depends on walk-in customers for any portion of revenue, then this illuminated signage will help generate sales! Save money and buy this illuminated signage over more expensive neon signage! Dimensions: Overall: 23-1/2"w x 11-3/4"h x 1-5/8"d Power Cord Length: 69"l Hanging Chain Length: 30"l [hook on each end] Weight: 5 lbs. This light up open sign is an illuminated display that highlights an 11 by 8.5 inch Duratrans poster with the word "open" in neon-style print. The light up open sign is made of clear acrylic. Mount the frame using the standoffs, suction cups or chains. The light up open sign, also known as an illuminated business display, is for indoor use. These signs go in a window by sticking to the glazing or can be hung with the enclosed chain. Additionally, this backlit business display, light up open sign mounts directly to the wall with the standoff and screw set that comes with the unit. The standoffs have a stylish chrome finish. LED signage can go above an interior door, such as an entry way to a bar. The backlit light-up open sign can go just about anywhere within a business. The switch is easy to get to, being right on the cord itself. Whether this display is needed for a shop, bank or restaurant, the light-up open sign will effectively notify everyone that the establishment is open for business. Attract customers with these bright LED displays. The light-up open sign has graphics that are styled after neon signs. However, these backlit LED signs are not as likely to break and not as costly as traditional neon signs. The light up open sign that looks like a neon display has a modern look thanks to the transparent and silver border. These signs look best in a modern or contemporary environment. The color of the graphics will make the light up sign that plugs in very noticeable. The backlit LED panel causes the lettering to glow. This light up sign that hangs with a chain will get people to come into a bar or restaurant. Other 2-color LED business displays just don't have the refined look that these signs have. This glass mount light up open sign is the best choice for stores or bar owners that care about the visual aesthetics of their business. Click here for wall mounting instructions. Provides a lot of flexibility in the type of fonts, patterns, drawings, designs, as far as your imagination takes flight and sky is the limit.
